content: I am not admin on my work computer, University installs and manages all programs. Can I ask them to install Lean and then use it from my non-admin account with no problems, or Lean requires admin rights to use, e.g. to install frequent updates and/or resolve frequent issues?
You should in principle even be able to both install and use Lean without admin rights unless your machines are nailed down in a way where you can only executed signed code or something like that.
Note that Lean does generally assume you have both curl and git installed though so if you don't that's something they'd need to do for you
I use Lean on a computer where I don't have admin rights on a semi regular basis and everything works just fine
